Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Campbell
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted WB: Jackson, Western, Van Buren, California and Jackson; EB: Jackson, California, Harrison, Western and Jackson

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Campbell, due to street blockage.

Westbound: Jackson, Western, Van Buren, California and Jackson

Eastbound: Jackson, California, Harrison, Western and Jackson

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Wabansia
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Milwaukee, Western, Armitage and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Wabansia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Milwaukee, Western, Armitage and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen and Wabansia.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Indiana/130th
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South MIchigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford, 130th and Ellis due to street blockage near Indiana/130th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford, 130th and Ellis, due to street blockage near Indiana/130th. 

A shuttle bus will be provided on Michigan, between 115th-127th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
